pkgmetadata.longdescription: New Multicriteria Method: AHPGaussian // Implements the Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP) method using Gaussian normalization (AHPGaussian) to derive the relative weights of the criteria and alternatives. It also includes functions for visualizing the results and generating graphical outputs. Method as described in: dos Santos, Marcos (2021) doi:10.13033/ijahp.v13i1.833.
